title: FS - T206 Shag Shaughnessy SGC 60 - Beautiful
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Shag Shaughnessy SGC 60 - Beautiful
posts.post_content:
Hi,

For sale is a T206 Shag Shaughnessy SGC 60 with an Old Mill back. The card is beautiful. It is graded SGC 60 with very nice corners, perfect centering and perfect color and registration.

The price of this card is $915 which includes shipping and insurance. I do not have PayPal, so I would like to be paid with a US Postal money order. I will ship out the card on the same day that I receive the payment. I will accept a check, but I must wait until the check clears before I ship the card.

If you are looking for a high-grade T206 Shag Shaughnessy, you will be very pleased with this card. I have scans below.

To buy the card, please send me an E-mail at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Thank you.

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]
